tooltip: Select Queen Oren as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Queen Oren focuses on improving the healing rate of units.
Allows you to summon Queen Oren, a frenzied Melee hero.
Fast moving Melee unit that can regenerate by attacking enemies.
Zola units gain increased regeneration when idle.
Health Regeneration rate All non-mechanical units increased by 10%
